data.message: I sure hope you've read the permissions for the facebook app... its just as bad. They even read your sms and mms text messages. Wtc, does reading our call logs and texts having to do with Facebook. Done deleted messenger,  now seriously about to delete the facebook app

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Kenny N Jennifer Kennedy. All developers must ask for permissions to make their apps work. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about our app permissions: http://on.fb.me/1oYCtfQ. -Natalie
What does knowing what my texts say & what pictures i get on my phone have to do with using the Facebook app? Simple question. That feels like invasion of privacy.
